did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This broadside announces, in German and English, the proceedings of a November 9, 1873 meeting held for working men in Philadelphia.

scopecontent.p: This broadside announces, in German and English, the proceedings of a November 9, 1873 meeting held for working men in Philadelphia.
